text:
The coverage went really smoothly, didn't it?
I'll rely on you for the shoot later, Kiriko.

Y-es...
Um... Are you sure... it was okay...?

I...
I wonder if I was able to talk properly...

Hmm... I think so.
How was the expression of the interviewer?

Uh...um.
they were... smiling... and listening to me...

Yeah, I think that's the answer.
The interviewer enjoyed talking with you, Kiriko.

Yeah, if your words reached them and they
enjoyed the conversation, then you did well, right?

...Yes... Thank you very much...
I'll do my best for the shoot later...!
